dialogue: Would you like to take a long walk with me at lunch to get some exercise?
Okay, I'll come get you at noon.
Yes, I only need ten minutes to finish this.
I only have an hour for lunch, and your ten minutes will turn into twenty.
That's okay because I wore heels today and I can't walk more than a block anyway.
Why did you agree to take a long walk if you couldn't take a long walk?
Because I was planning to walk to the store on the corner to do an errand anyway.
Just give me forty minutes to wrap this up.
